---
category: news
title: "Researchers study why neural networks are efficient in their predictions"
excerpt: "A study has tested the predictions of a neural network to check whether they coincide with actual results. To this end, they chose a well defined practical example: the neural network had to design a polymer molecule that would cross the lipid membrane in as short a time as possible."
